Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Fielding Avenue
ShortDescription: #79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Halsted, 76th, Vincennes and due to police activity near 79th/Fielding Avenue.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Halsted, 76th, Vincennes, then resume their normal route, due to police activity near 79th/Fielding Avenue.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Reroute near Roosevelt/Indiana
ShortDescription: #12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Roosevelt/Indiana.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Roosevelt/Indiana.

  • Eastbound buses will operate via Roosevelt, Michigan, 16th, then take layover at this location. 
  • Westbound buss will operate via 16th, Wabash, Roosevelt, then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #2 Hyde Park Express Temporary Reroute near  Lake Shore Drive
ShortDescription: #2 Hyde Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted due to severe weather conditions near Lake Shore Drive.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#2 Hyde Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted due to severe weather conditions near Lake Shore Drive.

Northbound buses will operate via Lake Park/47th, King Drive, Cermak, Michigan, Balbo, then resume their normal route. 

Southbound buss will operate via Balbo/Michigan, Cermak, King Drive, 47th, Lake Park, then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time. (A.M. RUSH HOUR ONLY)

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at 95th/Dan Ryan
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing at 95th due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing at 95th due to signal problems. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #14 Jeffrey Express and #26 South Shore Express Temporary Reroute near Lake Shore Drive
ShortDescription: #14 Jeffrey Express and #26 South Shore Express  are temporarily rerouted due to severe weather conditions near Lake Shore Drive.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#14 Jeffrey Express and #26 South Shore Express are temporarily rerouted due to severe weather conditions near Lake Shore Drive.

Northbound buses will operate via buses are temporarily rerouted via Jeffrey/67th, Stony Island, 57th, Hyde Park, Hyde Park Blvd, Lake Park, 47th, King Drive, Cermak, Michigan/Balbo, then resume their normal route due to severe weather conditions near Lake Shore Drive.

Southbound buses will operate via Michigan/Balbo, Cermak, king drive, 47th, Lake Park, Hyde Park Blvd, Hyde Park, 57th, Stony Island, 67th, Jeffrey, then resume their normal route

Allow extra travel time.

(Please Note: #26 South Shore Express will operate northbound only during a.m. rush hours and southbound only during p.m. rush hour)
